document.full_text: president barack obama promised federal aid on friday to the tornado-ravaged south, where deadly twisters have killed at least 339 people and caused billions of dollars in damage.
document.title: obama promises help to rebuild tornado-hit south
lines_and_colors: president barack obama promised federal aid on friday to the tornado-ravaged south, where deadly twisters have killed at least 339 people and caused billions of dollars in damage.
